narrative.title: Provider Overview
narrative.text: San Luis Walk-in Clinic, Inc. is a Clinic/Center, Multi-Specialty provider based in Somerton, AZ. From the 2018–2024 period, this provider received $107.2M in Medicaid payments across 1.8M claims serving 0 beneficiaries.

narrative.title: Why This Matters
narrative.text: This provider received $107.2M in taxpayer-funded Medicaid payments — enough to fund healthcare for approximately 13,400 Medicaid beneficiaries for a full year at average per-enrollee costs.
